TopicTitle: Macey Dean is still gone... four months of waiting

Articles.Content:
This is worrying now. Where on Kerbin is he? I've heard some rumours and hope most of them are not true. This one was interesting however: ''Macey was invited by the ISFA(International Space Fairing Association) Secret Operation's to design and build defense spacecraft to protect our solar system. For 2 months hes been aboard the MSP(Mercury Spacecraft Production) team. God bless him.Ã¯Â»Â¿''

I doubt that this is true but It still makes me wonder.

Hmm....

well he lied because he said season 2 would start soon and a half year is not soon.

I really want him back!

I'm sure he will be back eventually, probably has some real life stuff he needs to deal with instead of YouTube. Also, this is not the place to discuss his personal matters, so probably best for people not to talk about it before people start speculating.
And this person is who again?
Moved to the space lounge, the place for all itinerant chatter
I've been worried. He's not getting me to unsub, though!

I've been worried. He's not getting me to unsub, though!
2014 and not a new video?
A year has passed.... (I'd like to see him playing .24.2, and I hope he's OK) (Sorry for the necrobump)

No need for opening a new thread.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/74833-Macey-Dean
Who is he?

Who is he?

Really famous KSP youtuber who has disappeared off the face of the Kerbin.

No need for opening a new thread.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/74833-Macey-Dean

This thread is older than the one you linked...

This thread is older than the one you linked...

Whoops. Then it's merging time.
He is alive (he has a steam account, old grey wolf)

He is alive (he has a steam account, old grey wolf)

Could you send him a PM?
If he doesn't want to be involved with this kind of thing anymore then that's his choice. I don't think that people should go on badgering him.

He became Illuminati.

True story.
He just made his profile on steam private

If he doesn't want to be involved with this kind of thing anymore then that's his choice. I don't think that people should go on badgering him.

If you don't want to be involved, just say it, instead of leaving people to wait for years and get disappointed.

I think he did say it:

he has a steam account
Could you send him a PM?
He just made his profile on steam private

If you don't want to be involved, just say it, instead of leaving people to wait for years and get disappointed.
I know its not the nicest thing to do but Macey dean doesn't have to do anything. It's not like he owes anything to you.

I know its not the nicest thing to do but Macey dean doesn't have to do anything. It's not like he owes anything to you.

So you think it's right to just disappear from the Internet without any traces or hints just after teasing a new video season? This would only make sense if something really severe happened and he has not recovered yet.

Doing this makes a lot of people very angry, but I am not one of them.

So you think it's right to just disappear from the Internet without any traces or hints just after teasing a new video season?

I think you should demand a full refund.

I'd say its pretty safe to say Macey didn't just up and leave. He probably died in a car accident, or had something horribly traumatic happen to him that has prevented him from being physically or emotionally capable or returning. It is unfortunate but far more likely then the alternative that he just decided to radically change his life for no apparant reason, with no explanation.
I somehow doubt he died in a freak car accident and somehow we didn't find out.
